raw_body: Chairman of Best Holidays (Pvt) Ltd. on the 01st of December 2023. He leaves behind his daughter, Araliya Thevapalan and the three sisters, Shanthy, Rajini and Arulini along with their families Nimal, Patricia, Timothy, Rajan, Tabitha, Ariyanesan, Jeshuran, Andrew and Araliya Thevapalan’s mother Nilanthi.
